statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE zip_code = '12345'
SELECT customer_id, address, city FROM customers WHERE state = 'NY' ORDER BY address ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'TX' AND zip_code LIKE '75%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age <= 25;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price >= 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, age FROM customers WHERE age < 25 OR age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 150.00 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount, payment_method FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases pc ON c.customer_id = pc.customer_id JOIN products p ON pc.purchase_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM Customer WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE target_audience = 'Marketing';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM Order GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE target_audience LIKE '%target%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS total_products_purchased FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) > 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, purchases.purchase_date, products.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
